metadata.title: CVE-2024-38545 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Certified (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:RDMA/hns: Fix UAF for cq async event The refcount of CQ is not protected bylocks. When CQ asynchronous events and CQ destruction are concurrent, CQmay have been released, which will cause UAF. Use the xa_lock() to protectthe CQ refcount.
